song_lyric:
crossing, you'll never know that mountain high as Sierra Nevada
stop by, catching the moment when a seafow spreads its wings
winds through, Mojave Desert regardless of its east or west side
landing, right in the losing point, since you have been long gone, leaving.....
flicker or glimmer, we've talked as light in the sound's waving
confounding the dreaming with the face that are pensive smiling
instead of touching and penetrate it, actually the parallel journey
come on kid   where are going   welcome to the california
ready to California  reaping    words can come true
leaving California   closing    i'm not back you
ready to California  reaping    words can come true
leaving California   closing    i'm not back you
